abstract: Attendees of annual American Mosquito Control Assn conference in Savannah, Ga, display ominous urgency regarding threat posed by Zika virus; while experts seem to agree epidemic of Zika in continental United States is unlikely, many experts at conference warn that US will have to revamp its approach to mosquito control to address threat.
lead_paragraph: To combat the mosquito that carries the Zika virus, experts say the United States will need a “guerrilla warfare house-to-house method” of control.

headline.main: Prepare for ‘Guerrilla Warfare’ With Zika-Carrying Mosquitoes, Experts Warn
headline.print_headline: Mosquito Experts in U.S. Call for Guerrilla War Against Zika

snippet: To combat the mosquito that carries the Zika virus, experts say the United States will need a “guerrilla warfare house-to-house method” of control.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
